outline:
1. couple, pair, team, yoke
    1. couple, pair, span (usually of animals)
    2. acre
      1. the amount of land a span of oxen could plow in one day
kjv_def: acre, couple, [idiom] together, two (donkeys), yoke (of oxen).
strongs_def: hence, an acre (i.e. day's task for a yoke of cattle to plough)
